name: Nature s Secrets Intensive Care Lotion
description: Specially formulated with extra cocoa butter and skin-protecting antioxidant vitamin E, this creamy, fast-absorbing lotion provides advanced care by intensely hydrating dry skin and preventing roughness. It helps repair, nourish and protect skin for a touch that’s much softer, smoother and more supple. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
